Description: At the time of the accident the IP had emerged from the factory building, walked around a waste bin into the road and turned left.  At this same time, a FLT driver was driving along the same road.  A lorry appeared at the other end of the road coming towards the FLT driver.  At this point, the FLT that was carrying a bin of waste turned to the left and collided with the IP resulting in serious injuries.
Address: Merthyr Tydfil/Kepak Group Lim2 Sisters Red Meat LimitedPenygarnddu Industrial EstateMERTHYR TYDFILMid GlamorganCF48 2TAWales
